Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp

Class ScriptletElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp.ScriptletElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSPElement
    public class ScriptletElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSPElement
    Represents a JSP scriptlet element: <% java code %>.

    Scriptlets contain Java code that is executed during request processing. The code is inserted directly into the service method of the generated servlet and has access to implicit objects like request, response, session, out, etc.

    Example scriptlet: 

     <% 
   String name = request.getParameter("name");
   if (name != null) {
     out.println("Hello, " + name + "!");
   }
 %>
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
